category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_bom_compare
preference.preference_description: Activate the BOM compare performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time between the beginning of the operation and the completion of the comparison. Valid Values: * ON: Enables the performance monitoring of the BOM compare performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses the performance monitoring of the BOM compare performance transaction.
